title: Heisman Winner Slides In NFL Draft, Caught By Cleveland
teaser: The NFL draft opened Thursday night, and as sportswriter Stefan Fatsis notes, it wasn't short on drama. The most talked-about draftee, quarterback Johnny Manziel, slid to the 22nd pick. Stretched across the whole weekend, the draft has become all but ubiquitous.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
